name: tylerwalts-jdk_oracle
author: tylerwalts
summary: Automates Oracle JDK download and installation from tarball (not package)
description: Automates the Oracle JDK download and installation from tarball (not package), which does not have a dependency on a human download task, file share or centralized architecture design.  It fetches the installer binary from the target server, for the target server.  This approach assumes that automation is more valuable than bandwidth.
